snippet.title: MOUSE: P.I. FOR HIRE | OFFICIAL TITLE REVEAL
snippet.description:
We’re beyond excited to finally reveal the official title for MOUSE: P.I. For Hire - and our brand new trailer, which - as always - showcases some of our recent development progress on the game!

Coming 2025. 
Wishlist on Steam now: https://bit.ly/MOUSESteamYT

Make sure you join our official Discord to stay up to date - https://discord.com/invite/tbYfWm6YCs

Social Links:
X/Twitter -  https://twitter.com/mousethegame
TikTok -  https://www.tiktok.com/@mousethegame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/mousethegame/
Facebook -  https://www.facebook.com/mousethegame

Find out more about PlaySide Publishing on its official website: playsidestudios.com/about/publishing

To learn more about Fumi Games, please visit its official website: fumigames.com
